001package ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.flow;
002
003import java.util.Map;
004import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
005
006/**
007 * Tracks flow orientation (client/server) using SYN observation and fallback heuristics.
008 * <p>Thread-safe; maintains state in a concurrent map keyed by unordered endpoint pairs.</p>
009 *
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public final class FlowDirectionService {
013  /**
014   * Creates an empty flow direction service.
015   *
016   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
017   */
018  public FlowDirectionService() {}
019
020  private final Map<String, End> clients = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
021
022  /**
023   * Determines whether the current segment direction is from the client side.
024   *
025   * @param src source IP address
026   * @param sport source TCP port
027   * @param dst destination IP address
028   * @param dport destination TCP port
029   * @param syn {@code true} when the segment carries SYN
030   * @param ack {@code true} when the segment carries ACK
031   * @return {@code true} if classified as client-to-server
032   * @implNote When no prior orientation exists, the first participant is assumed to be the client.
033   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
034   */
035  public boolean fromClient(String src, int sport, String dst, int dport, boolean syn, boolean ack) {
036    String key = key(src, sport, dst, dport);
037    End c = clients.get(key);
038    if (syn && !ack) {
039      clients.put(key, new End(src, sport));
040      return true;
041    }
042    if (c == null) {
043      clients.put(key, new End(src, sport));
044      return true;
045    }
046    return src.equals(c.ip) && sport == c.port;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Removes orientation state for the flow, typically when FIN/RST is observed.
051   *
052   * @param src source IP address
053   * @param sport source TCP port
054   * @param dst destination IP address
055   * @param dport destination TCP port
056   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
057   */
058  public void forget(String src, int sport, String dst, int dport) {
059    clients.remove(key(src, sport, dst, dport));
060  }
061
062  private static String key(String a, int ap, String b, int bp) {
063    int cmp = a.equals(b) ? Integer.compare(ap, bp) : a.compareTo(b);
064    return cmp <= 0 ? (a + ":" + ap + "|" + b + ":" + bp) : (b + ":" + bp + "|" + a + ":" + ap);
065  }
066
067  private record End(String ip, int port) {}
068}
